appraisal.reason: According to this newsletter, Confessions at St Patrick’s Soho are Monday to Friday from 12:15pm to 12:40pm, not from 12:00pm. Saturday Confessions are from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, not until 6:00pm. No Sunday Confessions are listed. Please note the adjusted weekday start time and Saturday end time.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock

appraisal.reason: According to the bulletin, Confessions are heard for half an hour before all Masses, not only Monday, Wednesday–Friday 12:35–13:05. This includes confessions before the Saturday Vigil, the 6:30 pm Masses, and all Sunday Masses, with additional confessions on Saturday at 10:00 am during Exposition. Therefore, your stated timetable is incomplete. Please refer to the posted Mass schedule to determine the corresponding confession periods.
According to the parish bulletin, Confessions are listed as 11:45am–12:30pm (or on request). The timetable does not restrict Confessions to Mondays only.

According to the parish newsletter, the Sacrament of Reconciliation is available on Saturdays from 4.15 pm to 5.15 pm, or by appointment. The 4.15-4.45 pm time you expected is not correct; the published window is one hour.
